title: Natchez Trace National Scenic Trail: Plan Your Visit
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit           Plan Your Visit       There are five developed sections of the scenic trail for you to explore. To plan your visit to the Natchez Trace National Scenic Trail, click on the link for each section. Maps can be found at those links, or on the map page. Because the National Scenic Trail is administered by the Natchez Trace Parkway, please call the Parkway Visitor Center, in Tupelo, Mississippi, with questions at 1-800-305-7417. As indicated on the maps, several sections of trail are intended for horse travel, too. However, please keep horses only on those portions designated for that use, and note that horseback riding is not permitted along the Parkway.
